product_name: Nite Ize 1 Watt LED Upgrade II Kit - AA Mini Maglite
long_description: The Nite Ize 1 Watt LED Upgrade II kit transforms your AA Mini Maglite flashlight (sold separately) into a bright LED torch. Superbright 1-watt LED throws light farther and uses less battery power than the standard Mini Maglite bulb. LED uses less power than an incandescent bulb; 2 AA batteries (sold separately) provide up to 15 hrs. of use with the LED, compared to 5 hrs. with the incandescent bulb. LED outputs 55 lumens; bright beam reaches up to 50m and can be focused from flood to spot. Nite Ize 1 Watt LED Upgrade II kit is simple to install. Please note: installing a Nite Ize LED Upgrade kit voids the Mag Instrument(R) Limited Lifetime Warranty covering the AA Mini Maglite flashlight.
short_description: The Nite Ize 1 Watt LED Upgrade II kit transforms your AA Mini Maglite flashlight (sold separately) into a bright LED torch.
